form.p: This template will create a bndrun for launching a framework uusing the MQTT Distribution Provider and Zeroconf Discovery
Source code repo for this distribution provider: https://github.com/ECF/Mqtt-Provider
Once created, you can resolve the run requirements by clicking the Resolve button the the right-hand side of the bndrun editor.
NOTE: To launch this bndrun without service config, it's necessary to have a MQTT broker running at: tcp://mqtt.eclipse.org:1883/exampleRemoteServicesTopic.
Once resolved, you can click on Run OSGi or Debug OSGi buttons in the upper right hand side of the bndrun editor to launch.
This will produce output to the OSGi console to show either the export of the remote service (impl), or the discovery and import and calling
